name: Dark Future: Blood Red States, Official Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Dark Future Official Soundtrack


Immerse yourself in the explosive carnage of Dark Future with this exclusive content by Matthew Walker.

The 46 minute 13-track album, is provided in WAV and MP3 format and can be used for all of your highway warrior or gangcult related activities.

1. North America, 2025 02:27
2. Main Theme 03:26
3. Chemical Badlands 04:49
4. The Enderby Amendment 02:56
5. Thunder Peak 05:09
6. Car Corpse Valley 04:07
7. Days Long Gone 02:26
8. Stomping Ground 04:41
9. Loadout 03:53
10. Boss Fight 03:21
11. Thank You For Driving Carefully 00:54
12. Gehenna 04:11
13. Main Theme (Reprise) 03:29

Note: After downloading this content, these tracks can be found in the Dark Future folder in the Steam Directory.

Original Soundtrack by Matthew Walker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 GTX Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
